short_summary: Purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture for ISC and CIRNAC in Vancouver
description: ISC and CIRNAC have a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to various floors - 1138 Melville St., Vancouver BC. Phasing schedule to start August 21, 2023.
full_summary:
## Solicitation Notice

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting bids for the provision of office furniture to the Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) and the Canadian Inuit Relations and Northern Affairs (CIRNAC) Vancouver offices following a Request for Proposal (RFP) against an existing Supply Arrangement.

### Solicitation Details

| Category | Details |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS3872503091 |
| Publication Date | April 5, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2 PM (Pacific Time) on May 11, 2023 |
| Region of Delivery | British Columbia |

### Notice Description

The client is seeking office furniture, including delivery and installation, for their Vancouver offices. The tender includes deliveries and installations on various floors at 1138 Melville St., Vancouver, BC. A phase schedule is planned to start on August 21, 2023.

### Contract Information

| Category | Details |
| --- | --- |
| Procurement Method | Competitive, Selective Tendering |
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price |
| Contract Status | Expired (Note: Please disregard this status as it might be coming from previous information from the contractor) |

### Contact Information

For more information or any queries, please contact:

Kelsey Locke, Purchaser, Department of Indigenous Services Canada (DTI)/ Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

* Email: [kelsey.locke@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kelsey.locke@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15916472?extsite=MTU5MTY0NzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15916472?extsite=MTU5MTY0NzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
